Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of grey-brown pottery ribbed vessel, the interior is thickly covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and very faint traces of two lines of white-painted Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394409) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394409)
